longBusinessSummary: Foseco India Limited manufactures and sells additives and consumables used in the metallurgical industry in India. It also provides pharmaceuticals, medicinal chemical, and botanical products. The company primarily serves the requirements of ferrous and non-ferrous foundries, which in turn supply castings to various segments, such as automotive, tractors, general engineering, valves, power, railways, etc. The company was founded in 1932 and is based in Pune, India. Foseco India Limited is a subsidiary of Foseco Overseas Limited.
